mapper.select: SELECT semester_no semesterNo, semester_year semesterYear, semester_session semesterSession, semester_startdate semesterStartdate, semester_enddate semesterEnddate FROM semester
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO semester( semester_no, semester_year, semester_session, semester_startdate, semester_enddate ) VALUES ( #{semesterNo}, #{semesterYear}, #{semesterSession}, #{semesterStartdate}, #{semesterEnddate} )
